Class Trader

java.lang.Object
Trader
Direct Known Subclasses:
TraderBasic
public class Trader extends Object
The Trader object, Represents a real agent or trader within the active market. Allows the expected actions of buying, selling and querying owned stocks. Many helper methods that make the code more readable and usable.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Trader(Market market, double startFunds)
    Instantiates a new Trader.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addFunds(double funds)
    Add additional funds available to the trader.
    void
    buy(String ticker, double amount)
    Performs a buying interaction on the current market, Initially checks if the trader has enough funds to complete the transaction, before subtracting funds and recording the buy using the Asset object format.
    boolean
    canSell(String ticker, double amount)
    Helper method to check if trader owns sufficient stock to sell.
    void
    removeFunds(double funds)
    Remove funds available to the trader.
    void
    Run()
    Run method, used by the controller classes to trigger a market movement when required.
    void
    sell(String ticker, double amount)
    Performs a selling interaction on the current market, Initially checks if the trader has enough stocks to complete the transaction, before adding funds and recording the sale using the Asset object format.
    void
    sellAll()
    Performs a mass selling interaction on the current market, Iterates through the portfolio and triggers a sell() on each, to ensure all checks are still carried out.
    double
    stocksOwned(String ticker)
    Queries the portfolio and returns how many stocks are owned for that company.
    String
    toString()
    Advanced toString() override that outputs all information in a human-readable format.

  • Constructor Details

    • Trader

      public Trader(Market market, double startFunds)
      Instantiates a new Trader.
      Parameters:
      market - The Market being traded in.
      startFunds - Initial funds available for trading.

  • Method Details

    • stocksOwned

      public double stocksOwned(String ticker)
      Queries the portfolio and returns how many stocks are owned for that company.
      Parameters:
      ticker - Company ticker.
      Returns:
      Amount of stock currently owned.

    • addFunds

      public void addFunds(double funds)
      Add additional funds available to the trader.
      Parameters:
      funds - Amount of funding being added.

    • removeFunds

      public void removeFunds(double funds)
      Remove funds available to the trader.
      Parameters:
      funds - Amount of funding being removed.

    • Run

      public void Run()
      Run method, used by the controller classes to trigger a market movement when required. Intentionally meant to be overridden, to allow for advanced users to simulate more complex market behaviours.

    • buy

      public void buy(String ticker, double amount) throws InsufficientFundsException
      Performs a buying interaction on the current market, Initially checks if the trader has enough funds to complete the transaction, before subtracting funds and recording the buy using the Asset object format.
      Parameters:
      ticker - Company ticker.
      amount - Amount of stock being bought.
      Throws:
      InsufficientFundsException - Thrown when trader has insufficient funds to complete transaction.

    • sell

      public void sell(String ticker, double amount) throws InsufficientResourcesException
      Performs a selling interaction on the current market, Initially checks if the trader has enough stocks to complete the transaction, before adding funds and recording the sale using the Asset object format.
      Parameters:
      ticker - Company ticker.
      amount - Amount of stock being sold.
      Throws:
      InsufficientResourcesException - Thrown when trader has insufficient stocks to complete transaction.

    • sellAll

      public void sellAll()
      Performs a mass selling interaction on the current market, Iterates through the portfolio and triggers a sell() on each, to ensure all checks are still carried out.

    • canSell

      public boolean canSell(String ticker, double amount)
      Helper method to check if trader owns sufficient stock to sell.
      Parameters:
      ticker - the ticker
      amount - the amount
      Returns:
      the boolean

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Advanced toString() override that outputs all information in a human-readable format.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      String containing current funds, initial funds, current date, as well as current portfolio status
